price: Kwa hakika wale wasio iamini Akhera tumewapambia vitendo vyao, kwa hivyo wanatangatanga ovyo.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
footnotes: Hakika wale ambao hawaiamini Akhera, Sisi tumewapambia vitendo vyao kwa kuwaumbia matamanio ndani yake. Kwa hivyo wao wanababaika humo katika upotovu wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati zayyannā lahum aʿmālahum fahum yaʿmahūna
